Lallana: "This is what you want. These are the occasions you thrive on. West Ham last week felt like a semi-final & now this is the final."

Lallana: "What I liked was that there was a real calmness around the group. We showed great professionalism with the way we approached it."

Lallana: "The fans know their job. They aren’t stupid. They know there’s a lot riding on it. I’m sure they’ll stay patient like we have to."

Lallana: "I’ve felt as settled as I’ve ever been & I feel like that’s going to get better. There’s still plenty of room for improvement."

Lallana: "Getting top four enhances our chances of attracting top names. I am sure the funds are there & the manager will have his targets."

Lallana: "I’m convinced if the manager meets a player he’ll have a great chance of getting him. He’s got that ability to charm a player."

Lallana: "He makes you feel that you want to play for him. It’s a good asset for Liverpool to have going into the summer."

Lallana: “No disrespect, but strength in depth this season has possibly been an area which can be improved on. Certain injuries hurt us."

Lallana: "Missing Danny Ings this season was a huge blow. He will be like a new signing when he comes back into the fold in pre-season."

Jürgen Klopp says Liverpool have the resources, status & the power to go toe to toe with their rivals in the transfer market this summer.

Klopp: "I feel we're already back on track. It should not sound disrespectful. I really feel we're already on the way – we started already."

Klopp: "Decisions will be made about transfers in the next few weeks and maybe months. We will be stronger next year, that’s good news."

Klopp: "The Champions League would be the icing on the cake but that’s it not more."

Klopp: "It should not sound negative but if Champions League is the only reason why a player is coming it makes no sense for him or for us."

Klopp: "The world is not full of players who will make us better immediately, but there are a few out out there and we have spoken to them."

Klopp: “It would be difficult to think about the season and say ‘oh it was still okay’ if we don’t go to the Champions League from here."

Klopp: "We didn’t score but in some parts we played better than against West Ham. Against West Ham we scored at the right moments."

Klopp: "We can qualify with this game. I hope the people going to the stadium are ready to enjoy it & do the job. We’ll see where it leads."

Klopp: "We’ll use the power of Anfield. We have no issues with playing at Anfield - that would be the strangest thing in the world."

Klopp: "19 years in a row like Arsenal & people say ‘it’s only the Champions League’. We'd love to be there 19 years in a row from now on."

Klopp knows Liverpool's entire campaign will be judged on 90 minutes against Middlesbrough.

Alonso vs Allan

Stewart Downing:

Liverpool have got some terrific front players, with a lot of movement and goals in there. So we’ll have to be on our guard. Defensively, as a team we’re quite solid. We’ve struggled for goals but hopefully we can get a couple on Sunday.

Even in my time there, a lot of clubs set up behind the ball and make it difficult for Liverpool. But they have got some very good players who can still open you up. They have had a couple of disappointing results but on their day they can beat anyone and beat them well. We’ve got to be ready.

We’ll certainly have a go. We gave Manchester City a really good game and we should have won, to be honest. We’re not just going to go there and spoil the party. I would have hoped Liverpool would be in the top four by now. That’s not to be. We’ll certainly have a go if we get the chance to exploit the spaces they leave behind.

Jurgen Klopp believes Liverpool’s players “really deserve” Champions League football next season as they face their date with destiny.

Klopp: “My players deserve it. This is a special season. It didn’t happen too often you need 76 points to be sure of the Champions League."

Klopp: "So they were always ready, ready to bounce back in different situations, ready to accept different situations around the squad."

Klopp: "The boys were always focused. Yes, I think they really deserve it."

Klopp: "I dream of the biggest things and of course in one or two moments of the season I am as disappointed as a fan."


Klopp: "Now, this is our target and this is what we go for, and we have the opportunity and this is what we should use."

Klopp: "I have the owners support 100%. They showed that in the moment they offered me a new contract last summer."

Klopp: "There was absolutely no need for my new contract but the owners thought this is now perfect for the development of the club."

Klopp: "Their thoughts are completely independent from Sunday’s result but of course we all think we would feel much better if we win."

Klopp: "I am used to working until the last minute, being concentrated until the last minute. Most decisions are made in the last moment."

Klopp: "I know how people feel when they go to the stadium, they’re like 'Oh my God, please’ but we have to be smart as well as emotional."

Klopp: "We have to be well organised but fluid also. That’s what you have to be in all games. We have to show it again. It will be fine."

Klopp: "I always had really great support from all my bosses in the past. They really wanted that we succeed and are successful together."

Klopp: "It’s a long season, a hard season, but we are really full of energy and that’s what I really hope we can use on Sunday.”

Klopp: "There is one overriding message today: finish the job."

Klopp: "When you see a finish line you sprint. That is what we intend to do. Nothing is concluded. Nothing is guaranteed. Nothing assumed."
